In our course, you will delve into the intricacies of the **Digital Customer Journey**, using the See-Think-Do Framework to understand and map customer interactions. You will gain mastery over **analytical tools** such as Google Analytics and Google Ads, and implement web tracking techniques to monitor user interactions. The course also covers effective strategies for **Search Engine and Social Media Marketing**, which enables you to optimize marketing campaigns through analysis of various web and social media metrics.

Students will also be equipped with skills in **Data Analysis and Visualization**, using tools like Excel, SQL, Python + Pandas, and BigQuery to conduct marketing analysis and interpret data through dashboards. Advanced  **Artificial Intelligence and Generative AI** techniques involving Large Language Models, prompt engineering, and HuggingFace will be explored, providing an insight into the cutting-edge technologies shaping the field of marketing. Moreover, the course facilitates practical application by teaching students how to design and build **analytical applications** using Gradio to visualize data, customize dashboards, and enable data-driven decision-making in marketing analytics.
